entry.title: CryptoPunk Ethereum NFTs Floor Price Flips Bored Apes for First Time in 5 Months
entry.summary: The Bored Apes have been sitting pretty all year, but the CryptoPunks may be seeing a second wind.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Tornado Cash Crackdown Crashes Crypto Party, North Korean Hackers Post Fake Coinbase Jobs
entry.summary: Also, Ukraine’s vice prime minister shared the country’s crypto donation balance sheet since the start of the Russian invasion.

entry.title: Meet the Sleuthing Firm Helping DeFi Projects Stay Compliant With Tornado Cash Sanctions
entry.summary: TRM Labs has emerged as the firm DeFi projects are using as they scramble to remain compliant with new government sanctions.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Drop by Double Digits
entry.summary: Despite good news here and there, the crypto industry took a massive hit this week, with most of the major cryptocurrencies slumping.

entry.title: Crypto Winter Freezes Have Turned Investors Onto Hardware Wallets
entry.summary: Ledger says sales blew up 4.5x in the wake of the Celsius bankruptcy. Trezor and SafePal have also reported hefty sales figures.

entry.title: Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs Ethereum Floor Price Drops to 8-Month Low
entry.summary: The Ethereum floor price of the biggest NFT collection has slipped to its lowest level since the start of the year.

entry.title: What Are PFP NFT Collections? The 2D Avatars Taking Over Twitter
entry.summary: Profile Picture (PFP) NFTs have become the most recognized type of non-fungible token, as the technology bleeds into mainstream culture.

entry.title: SHIB Up 4.5%, Defying Wider Crypto Market Slump
entry.summary: The dog-themed meme coin has been on a tear over the last week, even as the wider crypto market crashed amid a wave of liquidations.

entry.title: Ethereum Privacy Platform Aztec Responds to FTX 'Freezing' User Accounts
entry.summary: Aztec Network, a privacy and scaling tool on Ethereum, says it is already taking active steps to prevent illicit use of its service.

entry.title: FTX US Hit With FDIC Cease-and-Desist Over 'False and Misleading' Statements
entry.summary: “We really didn’t mean to mislead anyone,” FTX US CEO Brett Harrison tweeted today in response to the letter.

entry.title: Huobi Stablecoin HUSD Regains Dollar Peg After Tumbling Roughly 10%
entry.summary: A “short-term liquidity problem” led to the instability of Huobi’s dollar-backed stablecoin, says its issuer.

entry.title: ApeCoin, STEPN Drop 15% as Gaming, Metaverse Tokens Plunge
entry.summary: Amid wider crypto market turmoil, major gaming and metaverse tokens are bleeding harder than most.

entry.title: Dogecoin Gets Hit Hardest Among Top 10 Coins in Market Sell Off
entry.summary: The meme coin and tenth biggest digital asset by market cap is down 14.6% in the past 24 hours.

entry.title: Bored Apes, Moonbirds Have 'Misled' Buyers on NFT IP Rights: Galaxy Digital Report
entry.summary: Issues with NFT holders’ IP rights could be a “huge problem for the future of the metaverse,” says Galaxy Digital’s research head.

entry.title: Who’s Firing—And Still Hiring—During the Bitcoin Bear Market
entry.summary: Some crypto companies are feeling the crunch of a market crash and reducing their employee headcount to cope—but others are still expanding and securing fresh talent. Here's who's hiring and firing in crypto right now.

entry.title: Tether Reveals 58% Decrease in Commercial Paper Holdings in Latest Attestation
entry.summary: Tether has just released its latest attestation report breaking down the reserves backing the USDT stablecoin.

entry.title: FTX CEO: US Crypto Derivatives Is What 'I'm Paying The Most Attention To Right Now'
entry.summary: Bringing crypto derivatives to U.S. traders has been "the single biggest ask of our customers as long as I can remember," said the CEO.

entry.title: Solana Move-to-Earn App Stepn Launches NFT Collab With Atlético de Madrid
entry.summary: Stepn's new partnership with La Liga soccer club Atlético de Madrid brings 1,001 exclusive NFT soccer boots to the move-to-earn app.

entry.title: SBI Holdings to Cut Bitcoin Mining Operations in Russia Citing Sanctions Concerns
entry.summary: Japan’s largest online brokerage, SBI Holdings, will be shutting down its Bitcoin mining operations in Siberia.

entry.title: Crypto Lender Hodlnaut Announces Police Inquiry, 80% Staff Cut
entry.summary: The beleaguered crypto lender Hodlnaut has joined the long list of firms slashing its headcount amid a wider liquidity crisis.

entry.title: Over $540M Liquidated as Bitcoin, Ethereum Plummet
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum have both dropped roughly 7% in the past 24 hours amid calls for further rate hikes in September.

entry.title: Gnosis Safe To Airdrop 50 Million Ethereum Tokens to Wallets
entry.summary: At least 400 SAFE tokens will be sent to 21,935 of 45,000 eligible addresses.

entry.title: Mercado Libre Launches Its Own Ethereum Cashback Token
entry.summary: Latin America’s leading online marketplace launched Mercado Coin today.

entry.title: 'No Current Plans' for Scrapped V1 CryptoPunks NFTs, Says Yuga Labs
entry.summary: As “official” CryptoPunks owners get IP licensing rights, Yuga says there’s nothing in the works around the divisive “V1” versions.

entry.title: Rarible Proposes No-Fee Bored Ape NFT Marketplace for ApeCoin Users
entry.summary: Who will build ApeCoin DAO’s NFT marketplace? Rarible throws its hat in the ring after Magic Eden, Snag Solutions make pitches.

entry.title: CME Group to Add ETH Options Ahead of the Ethereum Merge
entry.summary: The derivatives exchange wants to give its clients more ways to bet on the price of ETH as its network heads into a long-awaited upgrade.

entry.title: Ethereum Fork ETHW Plummets 62% Just Weeks Before Merge
entry.summary: The miner-led Ethereum fork ETHW appears to already be losing its appeal among traders—before it's even really launched.

entry.title: Huobi Bitcoin Exchange’s HUSD Stablecoin Loses Its Dollar Peg
entry.summary: HUSD, a stablecoin that is supposed to hold parity with the U.S. dollar, fell almost 15% from its intended $1 peg.

entry.title: Tether Hires Accounting Firm BDO Italia for Stablecoin Reserves, Adds Monthly Reports
entry.summary: Tether has signed up accounting firm BDO Italia to produce monthly attestation reports for its stablecoin USDT’s reserves.

entry.title: Dapper Labs Opens NFL Version of NBA Top Shot NFTs to the Public
entry.summary: Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes will be the face of NFL All Day, launching after months in beta.

entry.title: Ukraine Spent $54M in Crypto on Drones and Other Military Expenses
entry.summary: The Vice Prime Minister of Ukraine said that the country spent its crypto donations on drones and military software among other expenses.

entry.title: South Korea to Block KuCoin, Poloniex in Crackdown on Unregistered Crypto Exchanges
entry.summary: Authorities in South Korea are cracking down on 16 crypto exchanges allegedly operating in the country without registration.

entry.title: SHIB, Dogecoin Up Double-Digits Over the Week
entry.summary: Although Dogecoin and Shiba Inu posted losses in the past 24 hours, both meme coins are still boasting solid gains over the last week.

entry.title: Coinbase CEO: We'd Shut Down Ethereum Staking If Threatened by Regulators
entry.summary: Asked if he would choose to censor transactions or get out of the ETH staking business, Brian Armstrong said he'd choose the latter.

entry.title: Ethereum Name Creation Doubles In Four Months to 2 Million
entry.summary: ENS registrations have accelerated exponentially in the lead-up to the merge.

entry.title: Coinbase Has a Serious Insider Trading Problem, Study Claims
entry.summary: A trio of university researchers allege that 10-25% of Coinbase listings since 2018 involved insider trading.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Crypto Markets Dip on Release of Fed Minutes
entry.summary: Inflation is still "unacceptably high," the U.S. central banking authority said in minutes from its July meeting.

entry.title: Canadian Pension Fund Takes $150M Hit From Celsius Investment
entry.summary: CDPQ doesn't expect to get any of its money back, says CEO Charles Edmond.

entry.title: Ethereum Merge Will Be Good for Coinbase, Says JPMorgan
entry.summary: The investment bank said today that Coinbase could experience a “bigger revenue opportunity” from its Ethereum staking service.

entry.title: Dutch Officials Say Tornado Cash’s Code Could Be Criminal
entry.summary: The DeFi Education Fund said it's "still waiting for the specific charges against the developer to be released."

entry.title: Decrypt on the Street: An NFT Trip to Tiffany's, a Search for Status
entry.summary: In this episode of Decrypt on the Street, reporter Sander Lutz jumps through hoops in the hopes of obtaining an exclusive "NFTiff" from Tiffany & Co. Sander learns manners and spiritual awareness from two coaches, only to fall short of the digital brass ring.

entry.title: gm: Sam Bankman-Fried, Crypto Savior?
entry.summary: FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried is the man of the moment in crypto as he has bailed out multiple insolvent companies. Some are calling him Atlas, some sarcastically calling him savior. Sam answers tough questions from Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on FTX's bailout strategy, the controversial Voyager loan, his market outlook, marketing mistakes by crypto lenders, FTX competitors Binance and Coinbase, his political donations, and what he's learned about management.

entry.title: Why Musician and NFT Artist Jimmy Edgar Remains Skeptical on Music NFTs
entry.summary: Musician and NFT artist Jimmy Edgar is fully sold on NFT art, but not convinced yet on the uses of NFTs in the music world, he told Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Avalanche's John Wu Talks Institutional Interest and Use Cases
entry.summary: Ava Labs President John Wu sits for an extensive chat about institutional interest in crypto and DeFi (it has "absolutely not waned") and use cases of Avalanche with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Avalanche House in Brooklyn on July 15, 2022.

entry.title: Decrypt on the Street: Chipotle Says ‘Buy the Dip!’
entry.summary:
In our latest Decrypt on the Street segment, reporter Sander Lutz investigates Chipotle’s recent crypto marketing campaign and talks to Chipotle customers about their sadness amid the crypto crash.
Sander himself entered the contest hoping to get rich; instead he got a single cup of queso dip.

entry.title: How Civic Is Battling Web3 Bots and Spam: CPO JP Bedoya
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson reports from NFT Expoverse in LA with JP Bedoya, Chief Product Officer at Civic, the Web3 identity verification problem rolling out a new set of tools to keep people from spamming NFT drops to take advantage.

entry.title: gm: Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon is Finding the 'Soul' in Generative Art NFTs
entry.summary: Art Blocks, the generative NFT series, exploded in popularity and price last fall. Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon (aka "Snowfro") talks to Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves all about why the price surge actually hurt Art Blocks and the problem with NFT speculators, the debate over digital art vs. traditional art and his views on Bored Apes and CryptoPunks, how he got into NFTs after starting a physical tile business with his father, and why he thinks everyone's mortgage will eventually be stored on chain.
